bibl.title: A Petition and Court Proceedings: P. Michigan inv. 6060.
bibl.note: Dossier of two cases involving charges and counter-charges between priests of Soknopaiou Nesos and a fellow villager. The first column, dated to 18 October 123, contains a petition to a strategos. The second column, dated to 10 February 108, is the report of official proceedings conducted before another strategos. This second column reproduces in more or less the same language the legal proceedings recorded in B.G.U. I, 163 (a revised transcript of which appears on pp. 180-182).
HANSON Ann Ellis, A Petition and Court Proceedings: P. Michigan inv. 6060.
